review_title: Vegan Friendly + Nice & handy All in One Mix for convenience
review_text:
✒This one has passion flower, lemon balm, valerian , chamomile etc plus other stuff.
✒15 Drops was good for me.
✒ To save money I used order each ingredient separately to make my own custom mix but this one is more suitable for the ones who want to save time.
✒As of JN,24 it came in glass bottle

Good quality product.
Packed with care, fast and safe delivery by iHerb and its associates.
I've tried GABA and melotonin but nothing worked, but this helps me fall asleep naturally. I'm buying it again.
quality and strength of ingredients, good supply and dosage size, benefits for improving sleep, tart pleasant taste.
very good drug, I really recommend it to everyone, very active for health and the taste is really rich
good quality natural ingredients correct size good taste no effect yet too early to judge benefit pleasant taste
Effective natural sleep aid, medium size, pleasant scent, high quality, effective
